thread.title: Five Best Countries to Visit in 2015 (Saurav Mishra)
thread.title_full: Five Best Countries to Visit in 2015 (Saurav Mishra)

title: Five Best Countries to Visit in 2015 (Saurav Mishra)
text: By Saurav Mishra Jul 26, 2015 They would actually be the world's best countries to visit which one needs to tick off form their bucket list. The months of July and August prove to be pleasant in one's visit and take a tour around the world. Do not miss these countries if the love of travel has already hit your mind. Here is a list of the compulsory countries to visit in 2015 if you have still not set your heart there. Check Them Out:- 5. Morocco - Many people, after visiting the place, have already deemed it to be quite a happening place. Morocco can be described to be one of the most variant and also diverse countries in the continent of Africa. The country with its rich history and infrastructure of ancient cities and vast dessert landscapes attracts one and all. 4. The Philippines - You may have seen the east and the west but this country would not have caught your arrest. The country of Philippines in this list is a must watch as it is long overdue. There are amazingwhite sand beaches which also have complementary picturesque coastline. It also has some really amazing and also enchanting coral reefs which is just much more of a vacation spot orand destination. For people who are gourmets, art lovers and street shopping addicts, Phillipines is a must watch. 3. Ireland - Out of the world's best countries to visitfrom the list is Ireland. Ireland is a country which canactually tend to give a big boost to the tourism in the year 2015. People love the country for its amazing scenery and the real deal which it gets to the tourists. It is very true that the traditions of ongoing music and also dance along with beer, whiskey and food can be firmly rotted as well for enthused travellers. It is a great experience. 2. Lithuania - This is yet another gem from Europe's collections. It is the best place to go to. Lithuania is a country that actually comes as the most desirable out of the countries to visit in 2015. The country has a kind of rebellious, some kind of quirky and also a vibrant status. It is simply located on the aura of the majestic Baltic Sea and this country thus is full of history. It is packed with beautiful scenery along with mystery. You can learn a lot about this country the more you see it. 1. Singapore - Coming to be in the first place and also making a smashing debut, Singapore thus rules the chart. There are many factors which make these country covetable- new luxury hotels, Sports Hub, National Art Gallery, beaches, night life and much more. Increasing in its superb popularity can be attributed to the people who visit this country because they feel they have a high fashion scene and some really good and wide array of some high end shopping centers. You can couple these with the amazing fact that was there in 2015. Thus Singapore, rules to be the best country to be visited in 2015. About the Author Saurav Mishra is a well known travel blogger and have a great knowledge when it comes to traveling and exploring countries. In this article he focus over best countries to visit around the world. Rating:
